title: Wall Street rises on easing worries over rates hikes
text:
Wall Street rises on easing worries over rates hikes   01:03 
U.S. stocks rallied, recovering much of the losses from earlier this month, as a decline in Treasury yields calmed worries about rising interest rates and refocused attention on economic growth. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
